org.apache.samoa.utils

Class StreamDestination

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.utils.StreamDestination

  • public class StreamDestination
extends Object
    Represents one destination for streams. It has the info of: the ProcessingItem, parallelismHint, and partitioning scheme. Usage: - When ProcessingItem connects to a stream, it will pass a StreamDestination to the stream. - Stream manages a set of StreamDestination. - Used in single-threaded and multi-threaded local mode.
    Author:
    Anh Thu Vu
